thread.title: NRL Judiciary Round 25: Corey Waddell's season possibly over after high shot on Solomon Alaimalo | Sporting News Australia
thread.title_full: NRL Judiciary Round 25: Corey Waddell's season possibly over after high shot on Solomon Alaimalo | Sporting News Australia

author: @JedWells
title: NRL Judiciary Round 25: Corey Waddell's season possibly over after high shot on Solomon Alaimalo | Sporting News Australia
text: The Sea Eagles suffered a shock loss Thursday, going down to the West Tigers in what was a crucial game to keep their finals dreams alive. If the loss wasn't enough, the team may have also lost Corey Waddell for the season, with the forward facing a possible two-game suspension for a high shot on Solomon Alaimalo. MORE: [2024 NRL live ladder](https://www.sportingnews.com/au/rugby-league/news/nrl-live-ladder-2024-latest-standings-results/51b5e3011ba68b0997e5eabc) | [Every NRL club's updated injury list ](https://www.sportingnews.com/au/rugby-league/news/nrl-injury-list-2024-every-club-casualty-ward/c891dbff3846d886f4842211)| [Every NRL fixture and result for each club](https://www.sportingnews.com/au/rugby-league/news/nrl-draw-2024-season-fixtures-schedule-results-every-club/da218a04f62f705e83e9c966) Waddell's hit was a joint effort with Taniela Paseka, while Haumole Olakau'atu was also charged with a high tackle against Mason Heath. Take a look at all the Round 25 NRL Judiciary charges below: Waddell out for remainder of regular season Corey Waddell looks set to miss the Sea Eagles' final two games of the season, after being charged for a high tackle on Solomon Alaimalo. Waddell is facing a two-game suspension with an early guilty plea, which could be elevated to three if he's found guilty at panel. The forward was sin-binned for the play, one of three Manly players sent off during the course of the Wests Tigers shock win. Full Round 25 Judiciary charge list |Player||Charge||Opponent||Early plea||Guilty at panel| |Haumole Olakau'atu||High Tackle - Careless (Grade 1)||Heath Mason||$3,000||2 matches| |Corey Waddell||High Tackle - Careless (Grade 2)||Solomon Alaimalo||2 matches||3 matches| |Taniela Paseka||High Tackle - Careless (Grade 1)||Solomon Alaimalo||$1,000||$1,500|
